info.name: News Aggregator API Documentation
info.description: A comprehensive news aggregation API that collects and serves news articles from multiple sources including NewsAPI, NewsData.io, and The New York Times.

item.name: Articles
item.description: APIs for managing and retrieving news articles

query.description: Filter articles from this date (Y-m-d format).
Filter articles to this date (Y-m-d format).
Search articles by keyword in title or description.

request.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of articles with optional filtering.
If no articles exist, automatically scrapes news based on user preferences or defaults.

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "current_page": 1,
    "data": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Breaking News: AI Revolution",
        "description": "Latest developments in artificial intelligence...",
        "content": "Full article content here...",
        "url": "https://example.com/article/1",
        "url_to_image": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
        "published_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "source": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "NewsAPI",
          "slug": "newsapi"
        },
        "category": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "Technology",
          "slug": "technology"
        },
        "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z"
      }
    ],
    "first_page_url": "http://localhost:8000/api/articles?page=1",
    "from": 1,
    "last_page": 10,
    "last_page_url": "http://localhost:8000/api/articles?page=10",
    "links": [],
    "next_page_url": "http://localhost:8000/api/articles?page=2",
    "prev_page_url": null,
    "to": 10,
    "total": 100
  }
}

item.name: Get filtered articles for search page

query.description: Search keyword in title, description, and content.
Filter articles from this date (Y-m-d format).
Filter articles to this date (Y-m-d format).

request.description:
Retrieve articles with comprehensive filtering options for the search page.
This endpoint is designed specifically for search functionality with filters.

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "current_page": 1,
    "data": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Breaking News: AI Revolution",
        "description": "Latest developments in artificial intelligence...",
        "content": "Full article content here...",
        "url": "https://example.com/article/1",
        "url_to_image": "https://example.com/image.jpg",
        "published_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "source": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "NewsAPI",
          "slug": "newsapi"
        },
        "category": {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "Technology",
          "slug": "technology"
        },
        "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z"
      }
    ],
    "first_page_url": "http://localhost:8000/api/articles/filtered?page=1",
    "from": 1,
    "last_page": 10,
    "last_page_url": "http://localhost:8000/api/articles/filtered?page=10",
    "links": [],
    "next_page_url": "http://localhost:8000/api/articles/filtered?page=2",
    "prev_page_url": null,
    "to": 10,
    "total": 100
  },
  "filters_applied": {
    "keyword": "artificial intelligence",
    "category": "technology",
    "source": "newsapi",
    "from_date": "2024-01-01",
    "to_date": "2024-01-31",
    "sort_by": "published_at",
    "sort_order": "desc"
  }
}

item.name: Manually initiate news scraping based on filters

query.description: Filter articles from this date (Y-m-d format).
Filter articles to this date (Y-m-d format).
Filter articles from this date (Y-m-d format).
Filter articles to this date (Y-m-d format).

request.description:
Full-text search across article title, description, and content.
Automatically scrapes new articles if needed and merges with existing results.

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "current_page": 1,
    "data": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Breaking News: AI Revolution",
        "description": "Latest developments in artificial intelligence...",
        "content": "Full article content here...",
        "url": "https://example.com/article/1",
        "url_to_image": "https://example.com/image.jpg",

          "name": "Technology",

    "to": 10,
    "total": 50
  }
}

request.description: Retrieve a specific article by its ID.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: APIs for user authentication and account management

request.description: Create a new user account with email and password.
Authenticate a user with email and password.
Retrieve the current authenticated user's information.

item.name: Get all queue jobs with their status
Sync queue status with Laravel's queue system
User Preferences
item.description: APIs for managing user preferences and personalized feeds

request.description: Retrieve the current user's preferences for categories, sources, and authors.
Create or update the current user's preferences for personalized content.

item.name: Get personalized news feed for home page

query.description: Filter articles from this date (Y-m-d format).
Filter articles to this date (Y-m-d format).

request.description:
Retrieve a personalized news feed based on user preferences for the home page.
This endpoint is designed specifically for home page personalization.
If no articles exist, automatically scrapes news based on preferences.
